results.title: Cardiac renin-angiotensin system in the hypertrophied heart.
results.text_hl: Because the activity of the circulating RAS in the aortocaval shunt @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ was not higher than that in the sham-operated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in attenuating the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024741 @@@ventricular hypertrophy@@@ may be due to inhibition of the increased @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@ACE@@@ in the ventricle.

citations.NLM: Iwai N, Shimoike H, Kinoshita M. Cardiac renin-angiotensin system in the hypertrophied heart. Circulation. 1995 Nov 1;92(9):2690-6. PMID: 7586374
